article_title: Memorial Hermann names CEO for Med Center flagship
article_text: To continue reading this story, you will need to be a digital subscriber to HoustonChronicle.com.

article_metadata.description: Promising continued commitment to patients amid the shifting landscape of health care, Brian Dean will take the reins of Memorial Hermann's flagship operations at the Texas Medical Center, the health system announced Tuesday.  In an interview, he acknowledged the challenges for all health care facilities as the old formula and models of care are being replaced with new strategies to emphasize overall outcome in a value-based system.  Before joining Memorial Hermann, Dean held leadership roles at Jackson Health Systems in Miami, where he was senior vice president of finance and also the CEO of its Health Plans.
article_metadata.author.name: By Jenny Deam
